overview: In the not too distant future, a new deadly sport is the only way to stop a war that will kill millions. Fix is the creator of the sport, but the spotlight has always been on Ramzey. Now this hothead must use the game to stop the Revolution.
tagline: In 2025, Futuresport is the organized sport of the planet. But someone else is getting organized and their game is war.
title: Futuresport
